scenes.text:
Welcome to the Cardiff University Wine and Cheese Society!

As a sponsored youth group, we will be hosting regular events all over Cardiff to explore all of the fun that the worlds of wine and cheese have to offer. Whether you are an brie lover or prefer the classic cheddar, there is something for everyone.

No previous experience in wine tasting is required, most of the time we will only talk a little bit about the wine and focus on the most important thing… Having a great time!
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is £20.00 for both semesters and £10.00 for the second semester!

We are working with numerous restaurants, fromageries and wine shops to give our members the best possible experience at the best possible price. Our tastings will vary in size, formality and theme; however, we guarantee that you will have a great time.
